enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 102-CN.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: SCS CHEM 122-CN-100 General Inorganic Chemistry Laboratory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the laboratory course associated with CHEM 102-CN General Inorganic Chemistry. The lab applies chemistry laboratory techniques to materials science and nanotechnology. The course includes planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments. Credit for this course is 0.34 units. Enrollment is concurrent with CHEM 102-CN.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Grade of C- or higher in CHEM 101 or equivalent course, or consent of instructor.

subject: CHEM
